sentences.en: The features affected by family environment are intelligence, steadiness, excitability, perseverance, courage, sensitivity and suspicion.

sentences.en: The manic - depressive has alternating moods of black depression and wild, uncontrollable exaltation or excitability.

sentences.en: These anaesthetics block sodium channels and thereby the excitability of all neurons, not just sensory neurons.
sentences.cn: 这些局麻剂可以阻断钠通道, 因此不仅仅阻滞了感觉神经元,也同时阻滞了几乎所有其他神经元的兴奋性.
